showcaseData:.name: Flight Price Tracker
showcaseData:.description: A website that shows users the trends for flight prices for the last few years and lets users track flights. Users can bust myths about flight prices (eg. the best prices are lowest on Mondays) and use this tool to make their own decisions!

showcaseData:.name: FindMyToilet
showcaseData:.description: Helps users find bathrooms near them to suit their needs. Can help users look for accesible bathrooms, bathrooms with certain features such as showers, free sanitary products, baby changing stations in male bathrooms etc.

showcaseData:.name: Brief
showcaseData:.description: An application that helps users get news articles in a brief format by reading and understanding news from the user's favorite sources.

showcaseData:.name: FoodEx
showcaseData:.description: A food delivery service that aims to reduce waste by picking up (packaged and unused) leftover groceries from users to promote a more sustainable future!

showcaseData:.name: Jewel
showcaseData:.description: A website that enables people to sell personal designs on thrifted items keeping in mind sustainability as our core value.

showcaseData:.name: StockHawk
showcaseData:.description: An app that records trends in stocks that the user is interetsed in.
